full_summary:
**GRASS and LANDSCAPING - ST. ELEANORS PE**

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Tender Reference:** WS3901033361

**Tender Closing Date:** 23 March 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)

**Notice Type Details:**

This tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Landscaping services in St. Eleanors, PE. The contract will cover the following scope of work:

* Grass cutting services and landscape maintenance at the DND Site in St. Eleanors, PE
* Work will be performed according to the plans and specifications for DND Project Number L-C135-9301/47
* Estimated cost for this opportunity is within the range of $100,001 to $500,000 (HST included)

**Contract Details:**

* Contract duration: 1 April 2023 to 31 March 2024 inclusive, with an option to renew for 2 one-year periods
* Work to be performed by the successful bidder at their own risk and expense
* Successful bidder will be responsible for all labor, materials, tools, and equipment required to complete the work

**Contact:**

For more information, please contact Mr. Timothee Beausoleil2, PSPC, at [timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Details:**

* The successful bidder will be selected based on lowest price, taking into account the services offered and any additional considerations.
* Participating bidders must be registered on Buy and Sell to submit their proposal.
* Proposal submissions must be made in electronic format.

**Tender Notice:**
